H0.text: Starfish are the most important factor the student should add to the aquarium in order to make sure that the model of the ocean environment is accurate.

H1.text: Seaweed is the most important factor the student should add to the aquarium to make sure the ocean environment model is accurate.

H2.text: Salt water is the most important factor the student should add to the aquarium to accurately model an ocean environment.

H3.text: Coral reef is the most important factor the student should add to the aquarium to ensure that the model accurately represents an ocean environment.

A4.text: Coral reefs are one of the most well-known marine ecosystems in the world

A5.text: Marine ecosystems are characterized by the biological community of organisms that they are associated with and their physical environment
